metadata.title: CVE-2018-20458 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In radare2 prior to 3.1.1, r_bin_dyldcache_extract inlibr/bin/format/mach0/dyldcache.c may allow attackers to cause adenial-of-service (application crash caused by out-of-bounds read) bycrafting an input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0t64 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libradare2-common - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
radare2 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
